sourcesContent:
import './DetailedMovInfo.css'; import { NavLink, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; export default function DetailedMovInfo(){ const { movieID } = useParams(); const [ movie, setMovie ] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { let url = `http://localhost:3001/movies/${movieID}`; fetch(url) .then((res) => { return res.json() }) .then((data) => { setMovie(data); }); }, [movieID]); console.log(movieID); let pageN = Math.ceil(movieID / 9); return(
Title: {movie.Series_Title} Certificate: {movie.Certificate}
Year: {movie.Released_Year} Director: {movie.Director}
Runtime: {movie.Runtime} Star 1: {movie.Star1}
Genre: {movie.Genre} Star 2: {movie.Star2}
Rating: {movie.IMDB_Rating} Star 3: {movie.Star3}
Votes: {movie.No_of_Votes} Star 4: {movie.Star4}
Meta Score: {movie.Meta_score} Gross: {movie.Gross}
Overview: {movie.Overview}
); }
